channel.title: Basic beginner question (hopefully:P)
channel.description:
I am new to hosting p servers and i followed the tut step by step (the hosting a server tut.)
But the thing is, my compilers not working (it says i dont have JDK 5 or 6 but i do) and everything but the compiler works the client, the runserver starts but doesnt work because its not compiling or anything, idk help please

item.description:
@hmni wrote:

ha (it works now but it was because of my files i had not the enviornmental setup)

THANK YOU GUYS FOR YOU HELP =)

item.title: Basic beginner question (hopefully:P)
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Okay, I’ll try to explain. First go to start>my computer> right click properties, then click on the advanced tab. Okay now where it say User

variables for User, click new then name it “CLASSPATH” without the " and then for the variable value put "CLASSPATH=C:\Program

Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;" without the ". Now click new again and name it “PATH” and for variable value put "C:\Program

Files\Java\JDK1.6.0_13\bin;" again without the ". There I hope that worked, gl.

Read full topic

item.title: Basic beginner question (hopefully:P)
item.dc:creator: @hmni hmni
item.description:
@hmni wrote:

thats what i thought it was (and actually thats the tut i was following)

im not sure what it is, because ive set them correctly (i think)

path is: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_13\bin

Classpath is: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Is that wrong? (im on 6.13

Read full topic

item.title: Basic beginner question (hopefully:P)
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Sounds like you didn’t set your enviromental variables correctly, go into the tutorial section and find how to start a server by “The Soul” it’s stickied and you can’t miss it. In it includes how to set them correctly.

Read full topic
